article: How to Fold a Suit Jacket
intro: Folding a suit jacket properly will keep it from wrinkling and save you space in your luggage. If you're packing your suit jacket in a big suitcase, folding your jacket inside out or using a shirt-style fold should work. If you have limited room in your luggage, roll your suit jacket to save space.

points.name: Folding a Suit Jacket Inside Out
